summary: I’m a hands-on Full-Stack Web Developer experienced in building clean, functional web apps with tools like Django and modern front-end tech. I’ve worked on real projects, many internships and participated in hackathons, always focused on solving problems and learning new skills.

details: Developed and maintained web applications using the Django stack, ensuring scalability and performance.
Collaborated with the team to improve UI/UX, enhancing user engagement and experience.
Optimized database queries, improving backend efficiency and response times.

workExperience.company: Main Flow Services and Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
details: Completed hands-on training in Data Science with Python, learning statistical analysis and machine learning concepts.
Worked on real-world datasets, applying data visualization and predictive modeling techniques.
Gained experience with tools like Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib for data analysis.

projects.name: Mobile POS Billing System
projects.description: Developed features like billing system for efficient transactions, inventory management for real-time stock tracking, and market analysis to provide sales insights. Integrated AI-based price prediction and frequently purchased product analytics, along with employee dashboards for streamlined staff operations.
projects.role: Integrated AI-based price prediction and frequently purchased product analytics, along with employee dashboards for streamlined staff operations.

projects.name: Road Safe AI – Smart Navigation for Chennai Community
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered navigation system to help Chennai residents travel safely. Identifies accident-prone areas and suggests alternative safe routes in real time. Integrated features for finding parking spots and locating nearby mechanic shops. Built using AI, mapping APIs, and real-time data processing for improved safety and convenience.

projects.name: JobConnect Pro – AI-driven Recruitment System (hackathon winning project)
projects.description: Developed an AI-powered platform for job seekers to upload resumes, receive match scores, and get ATS optimization suggestions. Enabled recruiters to post jobs with skill-based weightage and filter top candidates using AI insights. Integrated features like application tracking, real-time messaging, and result notifications for a seamless experience.

projects.name: Rainfall Prediction (Paper Published)
projects.description: Rainfall Prediction using machine learning, published in IJAEM.
